doc.title: Amagenamiterere y'isi yose
doc.checkedUseSetting: Suzuma kugira ngo ushoboze iyi nzira.
doc.excludeDomains: Yongerako amazina y'indangarubuga azokurwaho Izina ry'indangarubuga rimwe gusa rishobora kwongerwa ku gihe.

example.domain: Ushobora kwongerako izina ry'indangarubuga, nka {{url}}, kugira ngo ukureho izina ry'indangarubuga ryose.
example.url: Ushobora gukuraho amahuza yihariye mu kwongerako amahuza, nka <kode>{{url}}</kode>.
example.glob: Ushobora kwongerako {{glob}} urugero, nka <kode>{{uguhuza gutoya}}</kode>, ku guhuza gutomoye.

doc.script: Ushobora kandi gukoresha inyandiko za js kugira ngo ushikire ubugenzuzi buteye imbere cane.
doc.checkedUseScript: Nimba ushobora gukoresha inyandiko yawe, menya ko ukeneye guca ku masandugu yose igihe kimwe kugira ngo ushobore gukoresha inyandiko.

example1.commentTitle: Ubu ku rubuga rwa {{youtube}}, ukeneye gufungura urupapuro rwa {{raba}} canke rwa {{ibiganiro bigufi}} rwa {{youtube}} mu gice gishasha.
example1.page: : Ihinduka ni ikintu ca URL c'urubuga rwo muri iki gihe Kugira ngo ubone amakuru arambuye, <a href='https://umuhinguzi. Ndagusavye urabe</a >
example1.isSameSubDomain: {{isSameSubDomain}}: Izina ry'indangarubuga rimwe Zirikana ko naho amazina y'indangarubuga nyamukuru ya {{youtube}} na {{imiryango}} yose ari {{Indangarubuga Nyamukuru}}, amazina y'indangarubuga ni {{Indangarubuga y'Igihugu}} na {{. imiryangoSubDomain}} Rero amazina yabo y'indangarubuga aratandukanye.
example1.minimatch: : uburyo bwo guhuza {{glob}}, ukoresheje ububiko bw'ibitabo, uburyo bwo gukoresha Urasavye Raba, canke ushobora kurondera ingene ukoresha {{glob}}.
example1.rightTab: : Ihuza rifungura mu gice gishasha iburyo
example1.wholeCode: Insobanuro ya kode yose ni uko ubu kuri paji y'izina ry'indangarubuga rya YouTube {{www}}, nimba ihuriro ry'indangarubuga ryakanzwe ari ryo nyene kandi inzira itangura na {{watch}} canke {{shorts}}, rero tab nshasha urupapuro ruri iburyo ruzoba rwuguruye.
